globalId.title: Global ID
globalId.description: globally unique identifier of this agent

description.title: Description
examples: My chrome extension used for test purpose

private.title: Private Mode
private.description: Whether collect intelligences that not created by yourself

concurrent.title: Concurrent Collect Intelligences
concurrent.description: How many intelligences need to be concurrent collected

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval
pollingInterval.description: Unit: second. How frequently to check whether need to collect new intelligences

maxWaitingTime.title: Max Waiting Time
maxWaitingTime.description: Unit: second. Max waiting time between two collecting jobs.

maxCollect.title: Max Collect Intelligences
maxCollect.description: **undefined** means infinity. Browser has memory leak issue if continue to open urls. To avoid this, need to close window when reach max collect times. Collect Time equal to how many request send to DIA to get intelligence.

idelTime.title: Agent Idel Time
idelTime.description: How long time browser need to wait to restart collect intelligences after close browser window. This time is used for browser to release memory.

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.description: Unit: second. If the request takes longer than timeout, the request will be aborted

maxRetry.title: Max Retry Time
maxRetry.description: Max retry time if send collected intelligences fail, if retried max time, then it will send back to DIA and mark those intelligences fail
